Name: Chupitos

Name: Chupitos
Review Text: Cozy little place with awesome, friendly and professional staff who can all incredibly remember hundreds of different and interesting shots! â€¦

Name: Chupitos
Review Text: Fun little shot bar but madly overcrowded. The shots they serve can be funny but almost always tasty. Because it is a shot bar it is quite a popular place for people to visit. Don't be surprised if you have to wait in line, even though it's never taken too long to get in for me.

Name: Chupitos
Review Text: Good experience but not much dancer

Name: Chupitos
Review Text: Boom! Shots! Shots! Amazing place to dance in, and have some delicious shots! I recommend Harry Potter shots ğŸ˜‰

Name: Chupitos
Review Text:
Very fun place to go drink.
It is a bar / club in one. It is known for its wide variety of shots. You can also order a few kinds of beer.
The place is rather small and can be crowded.

Name: Chupitos
Review Text: Very tiny place (as most locations are). But super fun! Great music, and all those famous fire-based shots Chupitos is known for. Everything is cheap and delicious. Only drawback is the location as there aren't many other similar places around it.

Name: Chupitos
Review Text: Great bar, sometimes it's very very crowded. Other nights there's not a lot going on. The purpose of the bar is their shots. They have a great variety and fun staff. Very creative.  It's quite small and sometimes there's a few people dancing to the loud music.

Name: Chupitos
Review Text: Its really a great place for a stupid night with friends! You can go in this very small place and enjoy some old fashioned disco music while enjoying a couple of weird chupitos. Of course if you want some style avoid this place. This is good for fun, not for showing off.

Name: Chupitos
Review Text: Every time that i've been there my night was amazing!!, is only a shot bar but u can have a  glass of beer or two :p or more, amazing shots from a huge list a lot of fun and dance!!! Recommented! :)

Name: Chupitos
Review Text: Wow this place is brilliant fun, it helps to have a few drinks in your system before you arrive and try and get here before it gets too busy as you have to check your bags and coats in their cloak room. Ensure you also have some small â€¦

Name: Chupitos
Review Text: Awesome place, great shots for a cheap price, friendly people. Overall a great experience. A little on the small side but that has its charm as well

Name: Chupitos
Review Text:
In general I am not that fond of shots.
They make you very drunk very quickly whithout really enjoying the journey there. â€¦

Name: Chupitos
Review Text: The bar may be small, but the shots are incredible  the music is great, and you won't break the bank on a night out. Will definitely be back next time I'm in Amsterdam.

Name: Chupitos
Review Text: Great place in Amsterdam, nice DJ, super friendly and funny staff. Many many options to get shots and thematics shots. The "Trump tower" was one of my fav. I recommend this placeee, if you wanna spend a good time with your friends.

Name: Chupitos
Review Text: Definitely more fun than I had expected. Good shots, good show, good atmosphere, good DJ plays mostly poppy hiphop, reggae and tropical. Crowd was young though; mostly 20 year old British tourists.

Name: Chupitos
Review Text:
The price-drink ratio is great. Nice list of drinks with funny names.

Place can be packed quickly and there is no real dance floor. â€¦

Name: Chupitos
Review Text: One of the best shots bars in town. Lots of spectacular drinks with interesting and creative flavors. It's not cheap but the music and the staff are great. Good place for a pre-party

Name: Chupitos
Review Text: Its a shots bar in the tourist part of Amsterdam, you get what you you would expect.  They play the music loud enough to have difficulty communicating with the bartenders.   Good selection of shots, servers were very nice.

Name: Chupitos
Review Text: Horrible music, a cheap crowd, and a staff that refuses service if you appear even mildly drunk. Combine this with an obnoxious bouncer, and a "you must use the cloakroom" policy, and you're just better off avoiding this place. Also, aren't you too old to do shots by now?

Name: Chupitos
Review Text: This place is so overcrowded that you litterly stand against everyone and been shoffed around. People get fustraited to eachother, and one even wanted to start a fight with me. And last but not least is that it is impossible to get a drink because there are so many people. I wouldnt recommand going there to get your shots.

Name: Chupitos
Review Text: I don't know how we got here, but pretty much standard bar - music, sticky floor, paid toilettes. But the selections of shots is alright.

Name: Chupitos
Review Text: Very tiny bar (but hey itâ€™s Amsterdam). The shots are amazing, entertaining and fun! Not that expensive and always fun to go there.

Name: Chupitos
Review Text: Great atmosphere. Can get really crowded. The place itself is tiny, but it's got a really peng vibe and a huge range of shots to choose from (absinthe!!!!)

Name: Chupitos
Review Text:
I asked for a 25cl beer, she filled it up to not even 20cl, and when I asked (very politely) if it would be possible to fill it up to 25cl, she just said no.
Afterwards I asked if it would be possible to give my friend a birthdayshot (as they did to a girl earlier), they said "No, it's a guy"... Sorry but that's sexist...

Name: Chupitos
Review Text: Nice shots and a lot of choices! Also a lot of surprise shots which are kinda funny to prank your friends with! Only bad thing is that it gets busy pretty late..

Name: Chupitos
Review Text: This bar is nice if you like horrible commercial music and a variety of shots without any explanation. It is fun to have visited once, especially if you're a tourist.

Name: Chupitos
Review Text: Had to take out a second mortgage, but it was definitely worth 2 of the delicious shots they serve here. Also apparently a great place if you are underage.

Name: Chupitos
Review Text:
The best place for crazy yummy shots in Amsterdam... Great crowd and staff, a bit too small yet fun to hang out for a while
Go for mother of dragon shot it's the best

Name: Chupitos
Review Text: Nice shots bar with exotic shots. The cheaper shots are not the way to go drunk. Always good atmosphere. Sometimes too young crowd.

Name: Chupitos

Name: Chupitos
Review Text: I really like the shots they offer and the music is 80% of the time really good but the one down side of this place is is that its really small

Name: Chupitos
